name: Mech League Smash
description: Mech League: Smash is a fast-paced action-sports game that pits 2-4 players against each other in a frantic combat tennis. Players scramble to retrieve and throw a glowing orb while unleashing devastating abilities and defending their end zone.  The rules of tennis loosely apply!  Players can bank their shots off of walls, and other players and use a blend of physics, trajectory, timing and aim to their maximum advantage.  The gentleman’s sport of the Mech League this game requires both strategy and skill.
